name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Fading Dreams, Dimming Shadows
summary:
Version 7.6 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes
• New Part 2 Story Chapter 3-EX: Bitterness for a Sleepwalker
• New S Rank Valkyrie: Jovial Deception: Shadowdimmer (Songque)
• New AstralOp: Serapeum
• New Featured Event: Schicksal Work Guide
• New Event: Powered Duo
• ...and more!
